title: Watch Face
summary: Prestigious, minimalist and elegant watch face for round and square watches
description: Express yourself with this unique and unusual watch face! descriptionHTML:
Express yourself with this unique and unusual watch face! Twister allows you to turn your Android watch into a prestigious device that can attract others with a modern design and catchy look and feel. Impress others by elegant and minimalist design!

It's easy to use and provides full customization:
- change background color
- display battery level of your watch
- show date
- hide watch scale (useful for devices like LG G Watch R with built-it scale)

It's perfect for round and square watches! Full shape and flat tire are supported!
Compatible with LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu ), LG G Watch R ( lgwr ), LG G Watch ( lgwg ), Moto 360 ( moto360, moto360_2015 ), Sony Smartwatch 3 ( smw3 ), Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch ), Samsung Gear Live, Huawei Watch


★ NOTE ★
Please note this is a watch app, not a mobile phone/tablet widget. If you don't have a smart watch, you won't be able to use it! Make sure your watch has the Android Wear System 5.0 or higher version.
Twister uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage data within the application.

★ TIP ★
If the Application does not appear on your watch:
1. uninstall the face
2. disconnect watch from phone
3. restart your watch
4. connect watch and phone
5. install Twister
comments: It's not flashy, and I like that. With this on the Moto 360 v2, new friends could go months before noticing that I am wearing a smartwatch. That's the way I like it.
